name: Puzzles for kids
description:
- Kids game for toddlers ages 1 to 5
- Puzzles for kids to develop logical thinking and coordination
- Coloring for kids that will entertain both girls and boys

Ages: 1, 2, 3, 4 and 5 years old pre-kindergarten and kindergarten kids. Kids puzzles are perfect for children who want to learn by playing.

You will never find annoying ads inside our app. We are always glad to receive your feedback and suggestions.
developers: Bimi Boo Kids - Games for boys and girls
